metadata.name: PUA - Nmap/Zenmap Execution
metadata.comment: Detects usage of namp/zenmap. Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of services running on remote hosts, including those that may be vulnerable to remote software exploitation

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\nmap.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\zennmap.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('nmap\.exe', 'zennmap\.exe')))

output.summary: Detects usage of namp/zenmap. Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of services running on remote hosts, including those that may be vulnerable to remote software exploitation

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrator activity References: https://nmap.org/, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1046/T1046.md#atomic-test-3---port-scan-nmap-for-windows
